typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as string,
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as string,
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['LP*.csv']) ~> LPSource
LPSource aggregate() ~> LPAggregate
